data.name: the_environmental_regulator_producer
data.value: The environmental regulator will review your organisation details. They’ll contact your organisation by email or telephone if there are any problems.

data.name: the_environmental_regulator_compliance
data.value: The environmental regulator will review your members’ organisation details. They’ll contact your organisation by email or telephone if there are any problems.

data.name: if_there_are_changes_producer
data.value: If there are any changes to your organisation details, you must report them within 28 days of them happening. You can do this by re-submitting your CSV files.

data.name: if_there_are_changes_compliance
data.value: If there are any changes to your members’ organisation details, you must report them within 28 days of them happening. You can do this by re-submitting your CSV files.

data.name: organisation_details_submitted
data.value: Organisation details submitted to the environmental regulator

root.data: It may take up to an hour for our systems to update.

data.name: page_title_producer
data.value: Confirmation that your organisation details have been submitted

data.name: page_title_compliance
data.value: Confirmation that organisation details have been submitted

data.name: you_can_save_this_page
data.value: You can save this page using the ‘print’ option in your browser.

data.name: print_or_save_as_PDF
data.value: print or save this page as a PDF
